abstract.para: Technical papers dealing with Swarm internals and design, and white papers describing Swarm's motivation, philosophy and future directions.

listitem.para: Integrating Simulation Technologies with Swarm a paper delivered to the "Agent Simulation: Applications, Models and Tools" conference held at University of Chicago in October of 1999.
Writing fast models in Swarm a paper delivered at SwarmFest 2000.
An open framework for agent-based modeling slides for a talk delivered at "Applications of Multi-Agent Systems in Defense Analysis", a workshop held at Los Alamos National Labs in April 2000.
Next Generation Swarm slides for a talk delivered at the Artificial Life VII conference on August 3rd, 2000
Swarm and COM slides for the integration workshop at the GIS/EM4 conference on September 2nd, 2000
An OOPSLA '97 position paper on summarizing the schedules of activity in the Swarm simulation system. (Postscript)
An OOPSLA '95 position paper on create-phase customization as used by Swarm libraries.
A 1995 overview paper (Postscript) (draft version of 1996 paper).
An OOPSLA '94 position paper on the concurrent object model implemented by Swarm.
David Hiebeler's 1994 paper describing the original (pre-Objective C) prototype of Swarm and the use of individual-based modeling in ecology and other fields.
